changeSet.author: nfleming
changeSet.comment: Add ALLEGED_TRACER_INDEX as a QC Result
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `qc_type` (category, description, name, ismultisample) VALUES ('AMPLIFICATION', 'Check the alleged tracer index', 'ALLEGED_TRACER_INDEX', false);
changeSet.rollback: DELETE FROM 'qc_type' WHERE category = 'AMPLIFICATION' AND name = 'ALLEGED_TRACER_INDEX';
